post:
[SSDVirt](http://www.ssdvirt.com/) - SSD VPS Hosting

**About Us**
SSDVirt was founded to provide high performance VPS hosting at affordable prices. We value our loyal customers and strive to provide the best service to them by never compromising on quality. SSDVirt is part of Garrison Network Solutions LLC, a Texas based LLC founded in 2010.

**VPS Node Specifications**
Intel E3 1230 or better
DDR3 ECC RAM
Samsung 830 SSDs
LSI 6Gbps Hardware Raid with BBU
1Gbps Port
New Jersey Datacenter (Test IP: 108.61.35.74)

**KVM 256MB** - $7/month with coupon code 512LEB
» RAM: <strike>256 MB</strike> **Now 512 MB**
» SSD Storage: 3 GB
» CPU Cores: 1 Core
» Transfer: <strike>250 GB</strike> **Now 500 GB**
» Port Speed: 1Gbps
**[[Order Now]](https://clients.ssdvirt.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=1)**
Please open a ticket with sales after you order to receive your upgrade.

**Upgrades**
Additional IPv4: $2 monthly
Additional IPv6: Free
Additional Storage: $1.5/GB monthly

**Benchmarks**
[serverbear.com/benchmark/2012/08/12/TjvnpPGESa3sOUHm](http://serverbear.com/benchmark/2012/08/12/TjvnpPGESa3sOUHm)

If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to [contact us](https://clients.ssdvirt.com/contact.php).
